German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Glück (“luck”) +‎ Wunsch (“wish”)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈɡlʏkˌvʊnʃ/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Glückwunsch m (genitive Glückwunsches or Glückwunschs, plural Glückwünsche)

  1. congratulation

Declension[edit]

1Now uncommon, see notes

Related terms[edit]

  • beglückwünschen
